backupGet.description: Generates a backup of a package and sends it to the client for download.

backupRestore.description: Restores a backup of a package from the dataUri provided by the user

changeIpfsTimeout.description: Used to test different IPFS timeout parameters live from the ADMIN UI.

deviceAdd.description:
Creates a new device with the provided id.
Generates certificates and keys needed for OpenVPN.

deviceCredentialsGet.description:
Creates a new OpenVPN credentials file, encrypted.
The filename is the (16 chars short) result of hashing the generated salt in the db,
concatenated with the device id.

deviceRemove.description: Removes the device with the provided id, if exists.

deviceReset.description: Resets the device credentials with the provided id, if exists.

deviceAdminToggle.description: Gives/removes admin rights to the provided device id.

devicePasswordHas.description: Returns true if a password has been created for this device

devicePasswordGet.description:
Returns the login token of this device, creating it if necessary
If the password has been changed and is no longer a login token, throws

ethClientFallbackSet.description: Sets if a fallback should be used

ethClientTargetSet.description: Changes the ethereum client used to fetch package data

fetchRegistryProgress.description:
Fetch registry scan progress
scanned x / y blocks

fetchDnpRequest.description: Fetch extended info about a new DNP

getUserActionLogs.description:
Returns the user action logs. This logs are stored in a different
file and format, and are meant to ease user support
The list is ordered from newest to oldest. Newest log has index = 0

httpsPortalMappingRemove.description: HTTPs Portal: remove an existing mapping

ipfsClientTargetSet.description: Sets the ipfs client target: local | remote

localProxyingEnableDisable.description:
Local proxying allows to access the admin UI through dappnode.local.
When disabling this feature:
- Remove NGINX logic in HTTPs Portal to route .local domains
- Stop exposing the port 80 to the local network
- Stop broadcasting .local domains to mDNS

newFeatureStatusSet.description: Flag the UI welcome flow as completed

notificationsRemove.description: Marks notifications as view by deleting them from the db

notificationsTest.description:
Adds a notification to be shown the UI.
Set the notification param to null for a random notification

packageInstall.description:
Installs a DAppNode Package.
Resolves dependencies, downloads release assets, loads the images to docker,
sets userSettings and starts the docker container for each package.

The logId is the requested id. It is used for the UI to track the progress
of the installation in real time and prevent double installs

Options
- BYPASS_RESOLVER {bool}: Skips dappGet to only fetche first level dependencies
- BYPASS_CORE_RESTRICTION {bool}: Allows unverified core DNPs (from IPFS)

BYPASS_RESOLVER.description:
Forwarded option to dappGet
If true, uses the dappGetBasic, which only fetches first level deps

Forwarded option to dappGet
If true, uses the dappGetBasic, which only fetches first level deps

packageGettingStartedToggle.description: Toggles the visibility of a getting started block

packageLog.description: Returns the logs of the docker container of a package

packageRemove.description: Remove a package and its data

packageRestartVolumes.description: Removes a package volumes. The re-ups the package

packageSetEnvironment.description: Updates the .env file of a package. If requested, also re-ups it

packageStartStop.description: Stops or starts a package containers

passwordChange.description:
Changes the user `dappnode`'s password in the host machine
Only allows it if the current password has the salt `insecur3`

portsUpnpStatusGet.description: Returns ports status from upnp scanning

portsApiStatusGet.description: Returns ports status from API scanning

releaseTrustedKeyAdd.description: Add a release key to trusted keys db

releaseTrustedKeyRemove.description: Remove a release key from trusted keys db, by name

seedPhraseSet.description:
Receives an encrypted message containing the seed phrase of
12 word mnemonic ethereum account. The extra layer of encryption
slightly increases the security of the exchange while the WAMP
module works over HTTP.

telegramStatusSet.description: Sets the status of the telegram bot

sshPortSet.description: Change the SHH port on the DAppNode host

sshStatusSet.description: Disable or enable SSH on the DAppNode host

natRenewalEnable.description: Attemps to open ports using UPnP

volumeRemove.description: Removes a docker volume by name

wireguardDeviceAdd.description: Add a device to Wireguard DNP ENVs

wireguardDeviceRemove.description: Remove a device from Wireguard DNP ENVs

wireguardDeviceGet.description: Get credentials for a single Wireguard device

EthClientFallback.description: If the DAPPMANAGER should use a eth remote node in cases of error syncing

NewFeatureId.description:
Welcome wizard / setup flow
Available routes / views in the UI

NewFeatureStatus.description: UI Welcome flow status. Persists the info of which page the UI should show

name.description: Metadata name to identify this key: `DAppnode association`
